titles: A seasonable letter of advice delivered to the Major of London; as he was sitting at Common Councell at Guild-Hall, on Tuesday the 27. of December, and by him read on the bench.
author: C. D.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "28. 1659. xber [i.e. December] 28".
